mention.text: ex - mafia boss vincent gigante dies in prison .
the ` oddfather ' for faking mental illness to beat raps
the powerful mafioso who avoided jail for decades by wandering the streets in a ratty bathrobe and slippers , feigning mental illness
gigante , who had suffered from heart disease
gigante , head of the genovese crime family
a lengthy string of victories over prosecutors
a brazen act to avoid the law - although it was n't until 1997 that a jury agreed
the crime family founded in 1931 by legendary gangster charles
the hitman in a botched attempt to assassinate then - boss frank costello
